    • Dwarf

    java.lang.Comparable<Dwarf>
    public class Dwarf
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Dwarf>
    A class that offers template for the instantiation of Dwarf miners.
    Version:
    October 21, 2019
    Author:
    Sena Yevenyo
